Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1984...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 7/31/1987 (Going to CIN: SS E. Yelding, RF B. Distefano. Going to NYM: CF A. Dawson)...
Injured on 8/1/1989 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1990, off Brian Holton (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/1990, off John Burkett (PHI)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1991...
Injured on 4/8/1993 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 9/7/1994...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Philadelphia on 9/9/1994...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 4/20/1995...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/25/1995...
